text_sign_up_intro: Let's get started. Are you ready to be a part of something new? Then boldly move forward with us.
text_invitation_code_info: If you have been given an invitation code, enter it below.
text_terms_agreement: I agree to the terms & conditions & privacy policy of use
text_time_sensitive_code_sent: A time sensitive code has been sent to
text_please_check_inbox: Please check your inbox, come back here and enter the code to continue signing up.
text_please_check_inbox_for_Forgot_pwd: Please check your inbox, come back here and enter the code to change password.
text_enter_email_instructions: Enter your email address below to receive a code that will reset your password.
text_search_typing_ph: Start typing to search through interests
text_privacy_warning: These settings are not yet working.
text_delete_account_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
text_select_tag_instruction: Select a tag to add to your list of interests, find people with mutual interests and see related categories
text_user_in_range: Only show me users in this range
text_validate_valid_email: Please enter a valid email address
text_validate_terms_and_condition: Please agree to terms and conditions
text_validate_pwd_not_match: Passwords do not match. Please try again.
text_validate_choose_dob: Please select a valid date of birth.
text_validate_choose_one_interests: Please select at least one interest to complete your profile.
text_no_cennection_requests: No new cennection request.Go to the cennect page to send new requests.
text_report_cnf: Are you sure you want to report this user?
text_block_cnf: Are you sure you want to block this user?
text_delete_cnf: Are you sure you want to delete this connection?
text_feedback_text_1: Your opinion is important to us. This way we can keep improving our app.
text_feedback_text_2: What is your overall satisfaction with Cennec?
text_feedback_text_3: Please select the type of feedback you'd like to give
text_validate_feedback_1: Please select the type of feedback
text_validate_feedback_2: Please enter your feedback before submitting.
text_set_as_default_cnf: Are you sure you want to set this as default?
